alert.note: Alert for Sheep Range; Spring Mountains (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued May 28 at 7:49PM PDT until May 29 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM PDT SUNDAY FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR THE SPRING MOUNTAINS AND SHEEP RANGE IN SOUTHERN NEVADA... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 463 and 464. * TIMING...Noon to 8 pm PDT Sunday. * WIND...West to northwest wind 20 to 25 mph with gusts to 35 mph. * HUMIDITY...Minimum humidity levels 10 to 15 percent * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
info.instruction: Outdoor burning is not recommended. Heed all fire restrictions.
